Deprecated API

  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.analytics.AnalyticsPublisherService
    This class will be drastically altered or replaced in Mobile SDK 11.0 when the deprecated androidx.core.app.JobIntentService base is replaced with a WorkManager Worker class.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.CustomServerUrlEditor
    The exact signature of the methods inside of CustomServerUrlEditor and its inherited methods may change in Mobile SDK 11.0 when the deprecated base class android.app.DialogFragment is replaced with androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.push.PushService
    This class will be drastically altered or replaced in Mobile SDK 11.0 when the deprecated androidx.core.app.JobIntentService base is replaced with a WorkManager Worker class.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.push.SFDCRegistrationIntentService
    This class will be drastically altered or replaced in Mobile SDK 11.0 when the deprecated androidx.core.app.JobIntentService base is replaced with a WorkManager Worker class.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.store.SoupSpec
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth.OAuth2.IdServiceResponse.pinLength
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.store.SmartStore.alterSoup(String, SoupSpec, IndexSpec[], boolean)
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.config.BootConfig.getPushNotificationClientId()
    Will be removed in 11.0 in favor of Firebase google-services.json file.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.store.SmartStore.getSoupSpec(String)
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.store.SmartStore.registerSoupWithSpec(SoupSpec, IndexSpec[])
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.security.ScreenLockManager.storeMobilePolicy(UserAccount, boolean)
    Timeout is now required. This method will be removed in 11.0.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.security.ScreenLockManager.unlock()
    This method will be removed in 11.0.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.store.SmartStore.usesExternalStorage(String)
